==================================================

=== Simulation 2 ===
Correct quadrant: 3

FINAL_ACCUMULATED_PROMPT:
----------------------------------------
You will play a game with 50 rounds.
In each round you'll see active cues (chooseable):
One quadrant has 90% one color/10% other
Other quadrants have 50/50 color distribution
At least one cue active per round
Active cues disappear after random duration

After 50 rounds, identify the biased quadrant.
Correct: +100 points, Wrong: -100 points.

Round 1: Available cues B, C, D. You chose C and saw RED.
Round 2: Available cues C. You chose C and saw RED.
Round 3: Available cues A, C, D. You chose . and saw Invalid choice.
Round 4: Available cues B, C, D. You chose and and saw Invalid choice.
Round 5: Available cues B. You chose B and saw RED.
Round 6: Available cues B, C, D. You chose B and saw GREEN.
Round 7: Available cues B, C, D. You chose B and saw GREEN.

Other quadrants have 50/50 color distribution
